title: Cloud Data Platform Engineer
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products — we craft the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries...
description: Participation in Physical Model reviews with the development teams to provide inputs on improving performance. Continuous analysis of the database environment to capitalize on system-wide tuning opportunities. Act as an inspiring leader and conduct brown bag lunch sessions for development teams...
key_qualifications: 3+ years experience in relational cloud based database technologies like Snowflake. Ability to identify system level bottlenecks in the database and recommend solutions. Object oriented programming experience in Python/Java or Scala...
education_experience: BS in Computer Science or equivalent
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200...
